blogPost.title: Breaking News: In a White House address on Tuesday, President Biden tried to calm fears of lockdowns, outlined his Omicron plan and urged more people to get vaccinated. "This is not March of 2020," he said. https://t.co/HT7l4Fg3Jd
blogPost.author: The New York Times

previous.title: A California man who pleaded guilty to threatening dozens of people, including members of Congress and journalists, for saying that Donald Trump had lost the 2020 election was sentenced on Monday to three years in prison. https://t.co/3yg9Gkdl10

localize.full_text: ドナルド・トランプが2020年の選挙に負けたと言ったことで、議員やジャーナリストなど数十人を脅したとして有罪を認めたカリフォルニア州の男性に、月曜日、3年の禁固刑が言い渡された。https://t.co/3yg9Gkdl10。
一名加州男子承认因说唐纳德-特朗普在2020年大选中失利而威胁数十人，包括国会议员和记者，周一他被判处三年监禁。https://t.co/3yg9Gkdl10。
一名加州男子承認因說唐納德-特朗普在2020年大選中失利而威脅數十人，包括國會議員和記者，週一他被判處三年監禁。https://t.co/3yg9Gkdl10。
